sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from "prop-types" function Rating({value,text, color}) { return (
=1 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>=0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =2 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>=1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =3 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>=2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =4 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>=3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =5 ? 'fas fa-star' : value>=4.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> {text && text} {/* It is same like -> text ? text : '' */}
) } Rating.defaultProps = { color:'#f8e825' } Rating.propTypes = { value : PropTypes.number.isRequired, text : PropTypes.string.isRequired, color : PropTypes.string, } export default Rating
